titles.title: Keep My Mind On The Rock

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Keep my mind on the Rock.
Keep my mind on the Rock.
Keep my mind on the Rock.
Oh Lord, I pray
Keep my mind on the Rock.
Keep my mind on the Rock.
Keep my mind on the Rock.
Throughout the day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Keep my eyes on the Rock (3x)
Oh Lord, I pray
Keep my mind on the Rock (3x)
Throughout the day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Keep my feet on the Rock (3x)
Oh Lord, I pray
Keep my feet on the Rock (3x)
Throughout the day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Let me be in the Rock (3x)
Oh Lord, I pray
Let me be in the Rock (3x)
Throughout the day.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Make me part of the Rock (3x)
Oh Lord, I pray
Make me part of the Rock (3x)
Throughout the day.
